message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's split closer to the middle, how about 55/45?
Meet in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is reasonable!
Time is running out, let's settle this. I'll come down a bit to 52/48.
Getting closer, 57-43 is my final compromise before things get worse for me!
This is my final offer Alice, 51/49.  Let's close this deal and avoid losing any more to inflation.
